title: Allowed Components object for the current panel.
description: This is applicable only if the panel's layout is grid system. This property is useful if needs to show list of allowed components in the client while authoring the panel.

components.title: List of simple objects representing all Allowed Components for the given panel

applicable.title: Is the given panel contained by a page, with authored template structure and is the given panel set as editable (unlocked)
applicable.description: true if the template has structure support and the panel is editable, false otherwise
